title: Treat Heat Injury
condition: Given a simulated casualty in a hot environment...
standard: Identify and treat signs of heat exhaustion or heat stroke.
steps: Step 1: Move the casualty to a cooler area.
Step 2: Loosen tight clothing and apply cool, wet cloths.
Step 3: Monitor vital signs and evacuate if needed.

title: Treat Cold Injury
condition: Given a casualty exposed to cold temperatures...
standard: Recognize cold injury types and administer proper treatment.
